title: Wendell Callahan Pardoned by Obama, Kills Three Victims?
subtitle: President Obama did not pardon a convicted drug dealer named Wendell Callahan, who was later charged with murdering three people after his early release from prison.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: President Obama pardoned a "violent crackhead" named Wendell Callahan, who went on to murder a woman and her two small children.
